wikipedia_page.main: Ian Stephen Yates (born 17 September) is a British Christian musician, who primarily plays a contemporary Christian and Christian alternative rock style of worship music. He has released four albums and three studio albums, Desperate to See Your Glory in 2007, The Hope and the Glory in 2010, Good News in 2012, and DNA in 2014. There has been three extended plays released from him, Really Good News in 2013, Spinning in 2014, and a DNA one, in 2015.

response: DNA is the third studio album by Ian Yates. 7 Core Music released the album on 21 July 2014.
Good News is the second studio album by Ian Yates. 7Core Music released the album on 24 June 2012.
